reviewText: Very basic from a production standpoint, but the substance is there.  Content-wise, it's a great 101, full of useful information and good knowledge for those of us exploring the idea of a saltwater aquarium.  I'd recommend it to anyone who is starting out in this area.

This Training DVD finally allowed me to stop wasting time and money on my saltwater aquarium and get it started.  There is so much information, tips & tricks, and Carson Passey is wonderful in explaining things in such a manner that everyone can understand.  I recommend this DVD to everyone that has a saltwater aquarium or is thinking about starting one.
